backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for a test series platform, including CRUD for tests, rankers, contact submissions, and admin session-based authentication with login/logout/validate endpoints.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state (rankers as array) into the new actor state (rankers as a Map) during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin login, dashboard, tests/rankers/contact management panels) to their source files, components, and test requirement IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of each frontend source file, summarizing their purpose, styling approach, and key functionality for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors for background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'Success Test Series Hub' and mounting the app at the `#root` div via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that implements client-side routing using `window.location.pathname`, rendering AdminLogin at `/admin`, AdminDashboard at `/admin/dashboard`, and the full public site for all other routes.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Renders the admin panel sidebar with navigation links (Tests, Rankers, Contact Submissions), active state highlighting, and a logout button with loading state.
React component providing an AI-powered test question generator with a topic textarea, difficulty selector, and formatted question cards displaying options and correct answers.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact form section that collects name, email, and message, submits via the useSubmitContact hook, and shows a success state with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ExamCategories.t: Displays exam category filter buttons (UPSC, BPSC, SSC, Railway, State Exams) as both pill buttons and icon cards, notifying the parent of the selected category.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing the brand logo, policy links, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/FreeTests.tsx: Fetches and displays a filterable grid of free tests with loading skeletons and empty states, opening a TestTakingModal when a test is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, desktop navigation links, and a responsive mobile menu that smooth-scrolls to page sections on click.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with a headline, exam category highlights, a 'Start Free Test' CTA button, and summary stats (students, tests, categories).
frontend/src/components/PaidTestSeries.t: Displays a three-tier pricing section (Basic, Standard, Premium) for paid test series with a 'Buy Now' button that opens a 'Payment Coming Soon' dialog modal.
A dialog form for admins to add a new ranker by entering student name, exam category, and score (0â€“100), submitting via the useAddRanker mutation.
frontend/src/components/TestFormModal.ts: A dialog form for creating or editing a test, supporting dynamic question/option entry with validation, and submitting via useAddTest or useUpdateTest mutations.
A modal that lets users answer multiple-choice questions for a given test, then displays a score summary and per-question answer review upon submission.
frontend/src/components/TopRankers.tsx: Fetches and displays a ranked leaderboard of top-scoring students with distinct styling for the top 3 ranks, including loading skeletons and error handling.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: A static section showcasing four platform features (AI questions, adaptive tests, live proctoring, analytics) as icon cards in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides utilities for managing an admin session token in localStorage, including get/set/clear helpers and a React hook that syncs token state across storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functionality and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including fetching tests, rankers, generating questions, contact submission, and admin CRUD operations (login, logout, add/update/delete tests and rankers).
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a navy/gold/sky-blue design system via CSS custom properties and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with React Query's QueryClientProvider and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContacts.tsx: Admin page that fetches and displays contact form submissions in a table with loading skeletons, formatting nanosecond timestamps for display.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard layout that guards against unauthenticated access, renders a sidebar with navigation, and conditionally displays the Tests, Rankers, or Contacts admin panel based on the current path.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with username/password form that authenticates via useAdminLogin mutation, stores the session token, and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRankers.tsx: Admin page for managing the top rankers leaderboard, displaying a table of rankers with delete actions and a modal for adding new rankers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTests.tsx: Admin page for managing exam tests, displaying a table with add, edit, and delete actions backed by useGetTests and useDeleteTest hooks, with a TestFormModal for create/edit.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens (gold, navy, sky), fonts (Rajdhani, Inter), box shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for the Success Test Series Hub exam prep web app.
